name: Stomp and Bounce
description:
This game is bouncy platformer and boss rush game. The more bosses you beat the higher your score. Read instructions in main menu. Unfornutenately online leaderboard doesn't work(even though it worked in unity editor but my luck I guess). You can post your highscores in the comments. Goodluck. 

Known bugs:

Sometimes Auris can knock you off map. Sorry for that but you have to restart it.

Bouncing off the wall won't work if you dash when you're already touching wall. You have to hit.

Programming and Game Design - me

Credits:

Background music from PlayOnLoop

Art:

Sunnyland, Sunnyland Forest,Warped Caves, Stomper, Gothicvania by Anismuz, Martial Hero, Evil Wizard, Monsters Creatures Fantasy by Luiz Melo
